𓄂 𓃭 𓃬 𒈤 ≠ 𓃮 𓄇

𓄂 forehead < CAT 𓄂 𓏏 𓏤 čakat ճակատ cheek !
𓄂 πρό pró “(be)fore” forepart прамац pramac πρῷρα prôira pruva prow ⇔ paw ⇔ pantera pard 𓄂 𓏏 𓏤 •PROTO πρῶτος בראשית fore-part (leo)pard ⇔ panter front 𒊕 𒆗 𓄂 𓏏 𓏤 front(man) 𒉺𒋼𒋛 pa-te-si patesi "governor"

𓄂 ⲗⲁⲃⲟ лъв 𒆷𒁍𒌝 lābum 𐌻𐌰𐌹𐍅𐌰 𐌋𐌄𐌖 ≈ 𓄂𓏏𓏮𓄣 ≈ 𒊮 libbu heart

𓄂 𓏏 𓏤 kaːʈum "head"

𓄂 maḥri 𓌳 𓄿 𓇋 𓃬 #mꜣj 𒈤𒊑 maḥ-ri 𒅆 ᵐIRI 𓄂 presence 𓁹 mir 𒈠𒄯 ma-har marchée

  1. 𓄂 cut cat head quarters 𓉔𓂧𓀁 bregma (head) vs
  2. pḫanther front (Leo)Pard 𓄂 ⋍ 𒂗 ⋍ 𒉺𒋼𒋛𒃻 Patesi Puzur ?

  3. RW⋍LW LöwenTier @ Levant [𓋁]] LeoPanther

  4. leo𓃀𓅡𓄇𓄛 leopaRUTi 𓄿𓏏𓄇 ?
  5. leoParter 𓊪𓎛𓏏𓏮𓄇𓄇 PowTer power 𓄇𓄇 pothenz 𓊪𓏏𓎛𓏮𓄇𓄇

𓄂 𓏤 Räuber 𓄂 𓂝 𓀀 rabbi 𒊏𒁉𒀀𒉡𒌝 ra-bi-a-nu-um "mayor" 𓌳 𓄿 𓇋 𓃬

first reading head < CAT can be reconstructed from the Egyptian word for heart:
* 𓇉 𓏏 𓄣 Ḫr.t ♥
* 𓎛 𓄿 𓏏 𓏮 𓄣 H.Ar.t ♥
* 𓎛 𓄿 𓏏 𓏮 𓄣 Ḫ.A.t ♥
* 𓄂 𓏏 𓏮 𓄣 Ḫa.t / cha.t ♥
* 𓄂 𓏏 𓏤 քիթ kʿitʿ (prow)
The R component of 𓄂 𓏏 𓏮 𓄣 Ḫrt might have been real as in Katzen kratzen (cats scratch)

𓄂 𓏏 𓏮 𓄣 | chest | छाती chātī
𓄂 𓏏 𓏮 𓄣 | chest | кутија kutija 𒃮

𓄂 𓏏 Head < 𐌷𐌰𐌿𐌱𐌹𐌸 < caput > cephal Kopf <?> 𓁶 1. Top ᵗSchopf Zopf Schöpfer Cover
which means the gothic variant 𐌷𐌰𐌿𐌱𐌹𐌸 must be very old or similar in development to 𓄂 𓏏 𓏮 𓄣
A 'b' component may be present in the old words 𓎛 𓄿 𓏏 ⇔ Habicht ≠ harbinger and 𓄂 𓏏 •pard ⇔ pantera

𓄂 𒈤𒊑 maḥ-ri 𓁹 maḥri "presence"

𒄞 GUD
1. 𓋩 𓏤 𓃒 cattle
2. 𓄂 𓏏 cat

The second reading is supported by

𓊪 𓂝 𓏏 𓆇 𓀀 𓁐 𓏥 | patricians
𓊪 𓂝 𓏏 𓄹 𓀀 𓏥 | patricians
𓊪 𓂝 𓏏 𓄂 𓂝 𓊹| patrician “part of god's elite”?

𓄂 ⇔ keula (prow) ⇔ Keule
𓄂 trjóna ? skegg ?

𓄂 𓏏 𓏮 𓄣 cha.t ⇔ κρατία kratía Kraft

𓄂 roarw vs miu𓃠

ϫⲱϫ , ⲁⲛϫⲱϫ , ϫⲁϫ- head, capital

𒄩𒉡 ḫa-zan-nu “Hassan” 𓄂 𓂝 𓀀 kḫatzhan ⇔ 𓄗 𓇼 𓀭
𒄩𒉡 mayor “Hussein” Husayn حُسَيْن ḥusayn √sehen ح س ن ḥ-s-n goodness…

𓌳 𓄿 𓇋 𓃬 | lion | Mai 𓄂 mayor ⇔ 𓏇 𓇋 𓅱 𓃠

𒉈𒋗 pil-šu < •pard
𒉈𒋗 breach, lion

𜑹𜎄𜏳 Puzur ≈ 𓄂 Parter Perser
𒂗 ⋍ 𒉺𒋼𒋛𒃻 Patesi

𓅓 𓄂 𓏤 mahir™ 𓁹 𒈠𒄯 ma-har marchée "before, front" 𓏇𓇋𓅱𓃠 miau mao mua 面儿 miàr 面 miàn أَمَام ʔamām 前 まえ mae 前側 まえがわ, maegawa

𒅗 kiri₃ 𓄂 nose

𒅗 kir₄ ಕತ್ತೆಕಿರುಬ kattekiruba kutlākāṛ "hyena" 𒅗 kir₄ kūrā@Hausa "hyena" һыртлан ᵏhırtlan •ḫlan γλάνος 𑂍𑂳𑂞𑂪𑂰𑂍𑂰𑂚 гиена ghyena

𓄂 𓏏 𓏤 proto pard "beginning" 𓄂 𓏏 𓏤 prow (of ship), forepart (of animal), forehead

𓊏 𓊪 𓋹 | sphinx | sphank s'panter 𓄂 𓃭 ?

𓊪 𓐍 𓏏 𓃭 | Pakhet (She who scratches ) | PuCat / PowCat 𓊪 𓐍 𓏏 𓃭 | Pakhet (She who scratches ) | ᵖwho ˢcratch √kratz

𓄂 ≈ 𒉺 PA •pro pre- fore in 𒉺𒂍 overseer, foreman, instructor

𒈠𒄯 ma-har 𓅓 𓄂 𓏏 𓏤 | in front of, before | 𒈤 𒌨 maḫu 𓌳 𓄿 𓇋 𓃬 maru
